segments.text: What a disgusting mess in this kitchen!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is spewing water like a broken fountain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking everything—the floor, the cabinets, her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she just stands there, drying that stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the wetness? It's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse with their climbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is filthy-handed in the cookie jar already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it could collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, begging for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole sneaky cookie heist is so irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The pretty garden outside can't hide the indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such avoidable chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet now!
segments.speaker: PAR
